subject: Re: Getting Started
author: brian_empson
full_text:
Wow this is cool, thank you all so much for answering my questions.  Now, how should I begin?  I have the recorder, do I need a noise source (like static or something) to get results?  My goal at this point is to get one convincing sample to show my friend that I'm not crazy.

I've read a few books, most state to say a prayer or something to that effect beforehand.  Personally, I don't think there are "demons" per se.  Negative spirits, probably; but beings who are created just to be evil?  No.

Again, thank you!
